title: Rowland Pettit MD, PhD, MBA
text:
Education:

Clinical Pathology Residency, Harvard Medical School, Mass General Brigham
MD/PhD, Baylor College of Medicine
MBA, Rice Jones School of Business
B.S. Biophysics, Duke University

I am a physician-scientist, company builder, investor, and writer. My PhD is in Bioinformatics & AI/ML. As a clinical pathologist in training, I have a particular interest in immunology, molecular genetics, diagnostics, and therapeutics. As an investor and company builder, I focus on frontier science and its applications, especially at the intersection of biology, healthcare, and AI. I enjoy writing, as well as amplifying interesting ideas from those around me here.
Do we share interests? Let’s connect! Feel free to schedule a 15-minute introductory slot here:
